00064         public function create_queue($queue_name, $returnCurlHandle = null)
00065         {
00066                 $opt['QueueName'] = $queue_name;
00067                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00068                 return $this->authenticate('CreateQueue', $opt, SQS_DEFAULT_URL);
00069         }

00085         {

00105         {
00106                 $opt = array();
00107                 $opt['returnCurlHandle'] = $returnCurlHandle;
00108                 if ($queue_name_prefix)
00109                 {
00110                         $opt['QueueNamePrefix'] = $queue_name_prefix;
00111                 }
00112                 return $this->authenticate('ListQueues', $opt, SQS_DEFAULT_URL);
00113         }

00127         {
00128                 $opt = array();

00131                 return $this->authenticate('GetQueueAttributes', $opt, $queue_url);

00241         public function get_queue_size($queue_url)
00242         {
00243                 $opt = array();
00244                 $opt['AttributeName'] = 'ApproximateNumberOfMessages';
00245                 $response = $this->authenticate('GetQueueAttributes', $opt, $queue_url);
00246                 return (integer) $response->body->GetQueueAttributesResult->Attribute->Value;
